comment: Main content box containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, including large seal script forms and smaller annotations. The text is arranged in traditional right-to-left, top-to-bottom format. Includes headers like '大十九' (Da Jiu Shu) and '文十八' (Wen Shi Ba), indicating section or character count. Contains phonetic annotations (e.g., '胡官切', '聲魚吻切') and etymological explanations (e.g., '从大介聲讀').
